name: VelocityHeatmap
functionalRequirements:
## Velocity Heatmap

### Purpose
Visualize deal velocity across stages using a heatmap.

### Features
- Grid-based heatmap
- Color intensity for velocity
- Stage labels
- Time period labels
- Hover tooltips
- Legend

dataRequirements.description: Receives velocity data matrix from parent

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- velocityData: 2D array of velocity values
- stages: Array of stage names
- periods: Array of time periods

### Visualization
- Grid cells with color gradients
- ECharts heatmap chart
